screenshots.description: Overview of Daily Wage Calculation table showing salary proration, EOS leave encashment, and unpaid leave deduction services with their configured daily wage formulas
Salary Proration configuration modal showing month calculation dropdown and number of days field
Dropdown menu showing three calculation basis options: Working days, Calendar days, and Custom days
End of Service eligibility section showing Vacation45 leave type with daily rate calculation
End of Service configuration modal header section
Leave pay rate section showing unpaid leave daily wage calculation with disabled formula fields and override indicator message
Daily Wage Calculation table showing three services with their configurations: Salary proration (30.45 days), EOS leave encashment (22 days), and Unpaid leave deduction (30 days)
Salary Proration modal showing month calculation field set to Custom days with 30.45 days and daily wage formula display
Dropdown menu expanded showing three calculation basis options: Working days, Calendar days, and Custom days (selected)
End of Service eligibility table showing Vacation45 leave type with daily rate calculation formula
End of Service Eligibility modal showing alert about daily rate configuration in payroll settings and expandable leave types with Vacation45 configuration details
